duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive marketing strategies to enhance brand visibility and promote products/services.
Lead, mentor, and scale a high-performing global Field Marketing team to drive pipeline growth and increase brand awareness.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.
Manage the company's online presence, optimizing the website and digital channels for maximum engagement and conversions.
Plan and oversee participation in industry events and marketing programs to generate new opportunities and support regional sales objectives.
Track and measure all field marketing activities, optimizing resources against outcomes and budget.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree (Master’s degree a plus) in Marketing, Business, or a related field
